items.question: Employer didn't pay full salary or fired me without notice. Who can I contact?
items.answer: This is illegal. You are entitled to full worker rights. 'Kav LaOved' helps asylum seekers exercise their rights with employers (for free).

items.question: Where can I learn a new profession?

items.question: I have no health insurance and I'm sick (non-emergency). Where to go?
items.answer: Terem clinics or specific clinics accept undocumented individuals...
